fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Customs, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020, Research Framework Programme, Initiative report on Access to Medicines, Reform Asylum System, Humanitarian files
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is an international, independent, medical humanitarian organisation that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural disasters and exclusion from healthcare. MSF offers assistance to people based on need, irrespective of race, religion, gender or political affiliation.
relevant_communication:
- Co-Chairing of the European Parliament Group on innovation, access to medicines and poverty-related diseases 
- Meetings with MEPs 
- Organisation and attendance of conference, public hearings, committees, etc.
